description.en: An introduction to the semiconductor manufacturing process. Courses include diffusion, microlithography and deposition.

description.zh: 以初學者為對象,基本理論與實際並重.從緒論,微生物之形態,分類與變異,微生物一般特性,微生物之發酵代謝,微生物催化劑等係簡介應用微生物之一般基礎概念.然後敘述釀造食品工業,微生物應用工業,微生物之遺傳與育種,微生物特殊機能之應用,培養工程學等,最後介述生物科技與化學工業之關係等.使讀者對各項微生物工業之應用技術,具有全般性概念.
description.en: This course introduces the general concepts of Bioscience and Biotechnique Especially, it aims on Applied Microbiology, such as the fundamental knowledge of the characteristics and classification, Mechanisms of fermentations, general biochemistry, the microbial biocatalysts, Fermented-foods, Applied Microbial Industries etc. In addition, it includes genetics, Special uses of Bionics, and describes the reaction between Biotechnology and Chemical Industries, among them, it cares with the protection of Environmental.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將基本物理化學原理應用在材料科學上，探討電子組態、化學鍵及晶體結構間之關係。內容包括晶體結構、X 光繞射分析、相平衡、材料之光學及電學性質及材料表面之鑑定及分析。
description.en: This subject covers the basic principles of physical chemistry and shows how they apply in describing the behavior of the solid state. The relationship between electronic structure, chemical bonding and crystal surface is developed. Attention is also given to characterization of atomic and molecular arrangements in materials as well as quantum optical and electrical effects in nanoscale materials.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

name.zh: 電腦媒介溝通與設計研究

description.zh: 從社會文化面、心理面、設計面，探討電腦媒介溝通與設計的關係與問題，並研究以電腦為媒介的溝通與設計，對群體、人與人間的行為模式、決策支援、媒體適當性等的影響，以期建立專案設計研究的溝通與設計原則。
description.en: From the social and cultural, philosophical and design perspectives, this course is to study the concerns and issues of computer-mediated communication and design, and to further explore the effects of computer-mediated communication and design related to group interaction, interpersonal behaviour, decision support, media appropriateness etc. This study also intends to establish the design principles of mediated communication and design for case study research

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 流行時尚與產品人類學

description.zh: 以人類學觀點，從資本主義與文化消費社會形塑過程中，考察日常生活用品之流行時尚現象，包括文化消費、身體消費、影像消費、網路消費、時髦物體系、產品與主體建構、次文化認同、後現代認同等課題之理論介紹、案例分析與產品俗民誌實習。
description.en: From the viewpoint of anthropology, this course is to inquire the fashion phenomena of everyday commodities in the context of capitalism and the formation of cultural consumption.  The contents include the introduction of theories, the case studies, and the practices of product ethnography in the aspects of cultural consumption, body consumption, image consumption, internet consumption, systems of fashion objects, 3C products and subjectivity construction, subculture identity, and post-modern identity.

description.zh: 圖像數位畫技術已然成熟，並朝多向度發展，深入各個應用領域。本課程重點是針對藝術與設計應用的相關技術，介紹相關的電腦圖像技術原理，並探討未來的發展趨勢。透過藝術創作與設計案例，協助學生建立對各類型數位圖像科技之整合能力。
description.en: This course is directed to discuss the theories and applications of computer graphics and the future development of the technology. The students will be provided with integrating the related technologies of computer graphics through the real design cases in digital environment.

description.zh: 人機境互動設計專題係使用者、產品、環境彼此之間互動作用為主題，思考其介面設計，產品語言和溝通之脈絡。透過理論、案例、實作，驗證產品創新方法。
description.en: Human-Machine-Environment interaction design is a field in which designers discover and respond to people's spoken and unspoken needs through analyzing physical, cognitive, social, and cultural human factors. These factors reveal human needs and activities in an effort to create products, messages, services, and systems that fit people's lifestyles. Human-centered design employs methods including behavioral observation, prototyping, and systems design.

description.zh: 在知識經濟時代，由於資訊科技及網際網路推波助瀾下，資訊的流通及知識的運用，創造出許多新技術及新的商學模式，更帶出許多商業機會。而這些技術與商學模式所產生之價值，大致來說與其創新性有密切之關係。故近年來，各界均在追求以創新來提升競爭力，無不希望能在運用創新理論與方法，創造出具價值的新技術、新材料及產品、或新營運模式。然一個成功的創新往往需蒐集、產生、分析、及運用大量的資訊與知識，如何在大量的資訊與知識中，迅速有效的得到結果，就必須要有一套好的工具與方法，知識管理也就是在這種環境下應運而生。知識經濟的基本運作架構，是讓大家知道，主要的知識價值，是蘊藏於知識中的機會，如何將知識轉變為價值，須要運用三種知識：第一，找出機會的是專業知識 (Domain Knowledge)，第二，將機會轉變為可行的計畫是規劃或策略知識 (Strategy Know;edge)，第三，執行計畫以產生價值的是執行知識 (Execution Knowledge)。本課程之目的乃在以此架構，配合策略管理，教導如何靈活運用此三種知識，來提升及運用創新力以創造價值，並進而提升企業競爭力。本課程同時也教導知識管理的基本流程，包括定義、創造獲得、整理分析、儲存、運用、分享等；也簡單介
description.en: In the knowledge-based economy (KE) era, due to the vast applications of the fast developed information technology and wide spreaded internet, there have developed many new technologies and new business models, and hence many business opportunities continue to emerge. The value created by these technologies and new models, in general, is closely related to the innovation of the technology. A successful innovation, in most cases, will collect, generate, analyze, and utilize a large amount of information and knowledge. In order to efficiently obtain effective results, a good tool and methodology must be applied. This is why knowledge management (KM) comes about.In this course, the framework of KE will also be illustrated by using three procedures and each has closely related to one kind of knowledge, namely, domain knowledge, strategy knowledge, and execution knowledge. Any business would be able to convert knowledge to business value and valuable asset when fluently using these proced

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.學會建築設計作品的首頁建構與網路基本應用的操作。3.學習建築設計影像處理技術。授課內容主題包括：電腦輔助建築繪圖與網路應用表現，個人Homepage設計，設計作品網頁表現，建築專業影像處理與環境影像改造，平面動態影像處理技術，建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.	We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.	We learn how to create homepage of architectural design in www.3.	We learn the image process analysis in architectural environment.The contents of this class is included about: the presentation of computer-aided architectural design and application in www, personal homepage design and personal design work's presentation, professional image process analysis in architectural environment, animation of 2D image process and application, introduction and application of professional soft of computer-a

description.zh: 本課程內容包括通風系統基礎，工業通風，排煙設計，空氣過濾、送風系統設計及安裝與測試，以系統設計為重點。
description.en: The contents of this course include the fundamentals of ventilation system, industrial ventilation, exhaust design, air filtration, air moving system design, construction and testing, the focus of this course is on the system design.

description.zh: 建築物理環境控制包含被動式(passive)控制與主動式(active)控制，本課程之教學目標在於提供建築設備、建築設計與土木營造工程學習者，認識建築物理環境主動式控制設備之內容系統特性、空間規劃、使用管理、設計方法，以及從生態建築設備科技的觀點出發，探討建築計畫與冷凍空調、電機、機械等環境控制設備介面間之整合與最佳化課題，以培育具有更宏觀、更前瞻、更專業與更高的建築、環境控制與設備的溝通與整合能力。本程共有六個建築設備主題：(一)生態建築設備科技概論、(二)空氣調節設備、(三)給排水衛生設備、(四)防災設備、(五)電氣設備、(六)輸送設備。經由本課程，培養學習者具有與建築師、專業設備工程師進行討論及提出需求想法之能力，並能閱讀設備系統圖及設備施工圖，同時加強學習者對於整體建築設備設計、系統整合與生態建築設備科技之體認，藉以提升設備工程、營建工程與建築設計品質，以及設施管理能力。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the technology of building environmental control systems and ecological building in the sense of integrated planning. This course offers encyclopedic coverage of fundamentals, rules of thumb, and detailed design procedures. This course emphasizes the concepts, system planning, facilities management, comparison of system costs and efficiencies, energy considerations, space requirements and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, electricity, water supply, plumping, fire protection, transportation and lighting into building's structure and design.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: (1)簡述行動無線通訊，(2)無線網際網路與WLAN，(3)行動隨意式網路（MANET），(4)MANET：MAC層協約，(5)MANET：多重路由協約，(6)MANET：服務品質，(7)MANET：安全協約，(8)MANET：電能管哩，(9)無線感測網路，(10)混合式無線網路，(11)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1)Introduction to Mobile Wireless Communications,(2)Wireless Internet and LANs,(3)Mobile Ad Hoc Wireless Networks (MANET),(4)MAC Protocols for MANET,(5)Multiple Routing in MANET,(6)QoS in MANET,(7)Security Protocols for MANET,(8)Energy Management in MANET,(9)Wireless Sensor Networks,(10)Hybrid Wireless Networks(11)	Recent Advances and Research Issues.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。 從早期的原住民社會，到漢人移民社會的建立，乃至今日多元化的工商業社會，在不同的年代歌謠與大眾生活的關係密切。傳統社會中民間歌謠具有祈福、教化、娛樂等功能，為數甚巨的民間歌謠是理解庶民社會的重要途徑；而當今社會中流行歌謠雖是商業機制下的產品，但其映見了大眾的情感與價值觀，也記錄了社會變遷的軌跡。本課程主要以台灣的歌謠為文本，透過歌謠內容的爬梳整理，以歌謠為史料建構大眾的生活圖像，生動地呈現出台灣社會變遷的面向。
description.en: From the early aboriginal society to the immigrant society of the Hans and even to the current society, songs--in different period of times--always play an important role in civil life. In traditional society, folksongs perform the functions of instruction, religion and entertainment. A large number of folksongs serve the gateway to understand the common people.  Though today's pop-songs are the products of entertainment business, they still reflect common people's emotions and values as well as label the mark of social change.  Taiwanese songs (including folksongs and pop-songs) are important texts in this course. Through the analysis of the song lyrics, the students are expected to draw a vivid picture of the social change in the past.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養有效率的工業人才。包括生產、分配、消費財貨與勞務的各部門，無論是新進的員工或最高層的經理，如要請求效率，則定須具備本門知識。本課程分四方面：（一）、人事心理，包括工作分析，人事選用程序及方法，人事測驗原理及應用，工作考核，員工訓練，工作評價；（二）、組織社會心理，包括動機理論與管理，態度與士氣的測量，組織理論與人行為，領導行為，員工參與，意見溝通；（三）、工程心理，包括工作環境與工作效率，機械設備與工作設計，意外防止與工業安全；（四）、消費心理，包括消費行為，廣告宣傳。上課方式包含講授，討論個人習作等。
description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. In class, lecture,

description.zh: 諺語是人類生活智慧在文字語言上的極致表現，藉著短短的一句話卻能表達出內涵豐富的意義，西洋諺語中在人際關係上有許多獨特的見解，不但深入且幽默更發人深省的句子；例如：(1)Give and take.  (中譯：施與受；與人交往應有來有往，互相體諒。)  (2)Wake not a sleeping lion. (中譯：勿驚擾睡獅；即勿自找麻煩。)    本課程目標為：(1)從西洋諺語中讓學生瞭解人性的需求以及人際關係的基礎 (2)從含意深刻的西洋諺語中使學生體會正確的人生態度，進而明白建立良好人際關係的技巧 (3)藉西洋諺語之介紹讓學生瞭解諺語之典故、使用法，達到提昇學生英文涵養之目的。    本課程將採取啟發法、小組討論、上台報告等授課方式，藉以增進學生思考及上台說話之能力。
description.en: Proverbs are the wisest words expressed in human life. By means of the short sentence, it has profound meaning. There are many particular views, not only deep but humorous, about human relationships in English proverbs. For examples: (1) Give and take. (2) Wake not a sleeping lion.  Both are short and have metaphor related with human relationships.     The objectives of this course are: (1) Let students understand the human needs and the bases of human relationships through English proverbs. (2) Let students realize the right attitude about the ways one should treats people, and then can establish the better technique for human relationships. (3) By means of using English proverbs to make students understand the proverbs' origin, usages and then to improve students English ability.    This course uses the methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, student presentation, and etc. In these ways we can advance students' ability to do deep thought and improve their speech ability when

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

name.en: An Introduction to Philosophy of Ecology

description.zh: 本課程將介紹分析下列基本思想：生態中心主義（內含深層生態及動物權及自然權、土地倫理、檢樸生活）、人中心主義（內含淺層生態/環境主義及環境正義、本土化及環球化等議題）、生態女性主義、荒野保護主義、生態社會主義，時間輪迴歷史觀, 綠色宗教論述 (如基督教生態思潮、佛經生態思潮、儒家與生態，原住民生態論述，以及後現代生態科學論述（內含混沌、複雜、模糊及量子力學等理論）。
description.en: Our course will critically and analytically introduce the following basic concepts: ecocentrism (covering deep ecology, rights of nature, right of animals, land ethics, and simple lifestyle), anthropocentrism (shallow ecology and environmentalism covering local and global issues ), ecofeminism, preservation of wilderness, ecosocialism, cyclic perspective of history, greening religions (eco-Christianity, eco-Buddhism, Confucianism and Ecology, indigenous ecological discourses, postmodern theories of sciences  (including chaotic theory, fuzzy theory, theory of complexity, and quantum theory).

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。專利權認識與管理，著作權認識與保護，商標權認識與管理，營業秘密與競業禁止，電子商務認識與運用。
description.en: Introduction and management of Patent, Introduction and protection of Copyright, Introduction and management of Trademark, Trade Secret and Competitive business forbidden, Introduction and application of e-commerce.

description.zh: 邊坡破壞之型態、分類、誘因與力學行為之探討，邊坡穩定分析之方法與理論，邊坡穩定處理對策略與防治方法之探討，邊坡滑動地層之監測、鑽探取樣與試驗分析。
description.en: This course covers various methods of slope stability analyses; selection of methods of analysis and strength parameters;field investigation for landslide problems; design strategies; landslip preventive and protective measures; and slope monitoring systems.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、鑽石、電子束、離子束、電漿、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，由冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結機械另件、燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過冶金課程的學生，能進一步對製造技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: Introduction to manufacturing processes, and introducing newest manufacturing technology. Applying physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials,

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

name.zh: 工業工程與管理書報研討

description.zh: 本課程重點旨在透過課堂演講、分組研討及研究論文寫作之訓練以探討有關於工業工程與管理的發展與趨勢。
description.en: Introduction:This course focuses on seminar, group study, and training of students' research ability about development and future trend of industrial engineering and management.

description.zh: 本課程重點旨在透過海外研習探討全球化趨勢下之經營管理實務應用，拓展學員國際視野與世界觀。
description.en: The course practices the global management and develops student's sense of international business trend by oversea seminars.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 1.建築結構概述 2.建築結構設計規範及設計方法 3.建築結構載重 4.高樓結構系統規劃 5.高樓結構應力分析 6.高樓結構之動力分析 7.建築結構材料及其特性 8.鋼筋混凝土構造設計 9.鋼骨構造設計 10.鋼筋鋼筋混凝土構造設計 11.基礎設計 12.高樓結構設計與建造
description.en: 1.Introduction to building structures 2.The design codes, and methods of building structures 3.Loading of building structures 4.Planning of the high rise building structures 5.Stress analysis of the high rise building structures 6.Structural dynamic analysis of building ssssstructures 7.Material Characteristics of building structures 8.Design of reinforced concrete(RC)building structures 9.Design of steel building structures 10.Design of SRC building structures 11.Design of foundation 12.Construction of high rise building structures

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛生產與行銷較一般商品所涵蓋的範疇複雜，如車輛製造管理、新車市場行銷、中古車通路、售後服務到融資與保險等的關連性，使之瞭解其間的重要性，並使其對未來車輛產業的職場認識有助益外，又可增添其在就業市場上的競爭機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the vehicle production and marketing in the part of production preparation, mass production control, new car marketing, used car marketing, after service, insurance, etc. The purpose of this course is to increase students' knowledge of vehicle industry and enhance students' competitive advantage.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

description.zh: 本課程旨在研究室內設計數位化的技巧，藉由各種相關軟體與自行建立Third Party的應用，完成室內設計案虛擬實境的效果，同時以室內設計個案的實際演練，達到室內設計師與客戶間的良好溝通與充分檢討。
description.en: This course aims to study the digital techniques for interior design.  With the related software and self-made third party applications, the interior design project is conducted in the form of virtual-reality.  Meanwhile, through the practicing of interior design projects the communication between designers and clients is emphasized.

description.zh: 「現代真空技術」課程概述真空技術廣泛應用在高科技產業中，如半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、太陽能、材料冶金、生物科技等。近幾年來由於高科技產業的蓬勃發展，帶動了真空產業的起飛，使得真空技術的發展一日千里，本課程除了介紹基本真空技術原理之外，另外將介紹目前在高科技產業中所使用的各項真空系統及相關零組件。課程內容包含有真空技術基礎、真空幫浦、真空計、真空材料與元件、抽氣過程與幫浦大小之選擇、真空系統、真空測漏技術與真空技術之應用。
description.en: The vacuum technology and industry are growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, flat panel displayer, optics-electrics, thin film, cryogenic, solar energy, material, and biotechnology. The course will introduce the basic vacuum technology and the newly vacuum equipment and related vacuum components widely used in modern high-tech industrials. The contents of the course are basic vacuum technology, vacuum pump, vacuum gauge, material and component, pumping system, leak detection, and applications of vacuum technology.

name.en: Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹機器視覺之基本觀念與系統設計、組成機器視覺系統之元件 (攝影機、鏡頭及照明設備等)、重要之照像幾何學與立體測量法，同時介紹二位元影像處理、視覺對準法則、相機校正法、計算視覺與打光技術等重要基礎知識，配合影像處理演算法之介紹，使學員建立完整之機器視覺基礎與概念。(本課程參考麻省理工學院(MIT)之開放式課程)將包含下列主題:o 影像之形成 (Image Formation)o 視覺系統設計 (Vision System Design)o 移動中視覺 (Motion Vision)o 陰影成像法 (Shape from Shading)o 二位元影像處理 (Binary Image Processing)o 照像測量法 (Photogrammetry)o 立體影像 (Stereo Vision)o 對準法則 (Object Representation Alignment)o 相機校正法 (Camera Calibration)o 計算視覺 (Computational Vision)o 打光技術 (Optical Illumination)o 機器視覺之應用 (Applications to robotics and intelligent machine
description.en: This subject provides an introduction to the process of generating asymbolic description of an environment from an image and the fundamentals ofmachine vision and image processing techniques. Lectures include the followingtopics:※ The physics of image formation,※ Vision System Design,※ Motion vision,※ Recovering shapes from shading,※ Shape from Shading,※ Binary image processing,※ Photogrammetry,※ Stereo Vision,※ Object representation alignment,※ Camera Calibration,※ Computational vision,※ Optical Illumination,※ Applications to robotics and intelligent machine interactionTextbook:Horn, Berthold K. P., Robot Vision. Cambridge, MA: MIT Press/McGraw-Hill,March 1986. ISBN: 0262081598.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計積体電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路佈局的能力,課程內容包念： 1. SOPC介紹 2.SOPC發展環境 3.系統層設計練習 4.SOPC驗證 5.設計範例 6.SOPC設計實習
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of advanced FPGA system. Therefore, the student has the design capability of advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to SOPC 2.SOPC development environment 3.System-level design practices 4.SOPC verification 5.Design examples 6.SOPC design LABs

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生有關「創新產品設計」之進階知識及實務應用技能，課程包含：產品趨勢推論、本土化產品創新特質及發展，課程並著重在跳躍式、漸進式及綜合式設計案例研究、專案企畫發展、評估與專案管理。
description.en: Principles and Practice of Product Innovation, Product Evolution, Nature of Indigenous Product Innovation and its Development, Case Studies in Radical and Incremental Design in Design Project Planning, Development, Evaluation and Management.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 了解國內外紡織市場與行銷策略，紡織工業之建立、紡織工業之發展過、台灣紡織與製衣工業外銷情況、世界市場紡織品之行銷策略、如何突破外銷瓶頸、如何生產附加價值高之紡織品以適合市場之需要。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to provide an international and historical perspective on the situation in the Taiwan's textile industry and from this perspective on the suggest alternative for its future development.  We begin our study of marketing and discuss the facts that form the foundation for the rest of the study.(1) Economics of the global textile industry.(2) The current state of Taiwan's textile industry.(3) The evolution of competitive strategies.(4) Countermeasures for industry.    Product differentiation--higher value-added product, better quality, image or superior custmoer service.    Computerization--utilize computerized information network for internal management and worldwide trade communication.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。

All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題如：1.全球運籌之產業環境；2.全球運籌之經營模式與績效衡量；3.全球運籌之運作模式；4.全球運籌之4PL；5.全球運籌與之其他相關議題，如物流、金流及通關等；6.案例研討；7.我國全球運籌管理之未來發展。
description.en: This course includes following sections:1.Global logistics environment;2.Global logistics business model and performance   evaluation;3.Global logistics operation model;4.4PL in global logistics environment;5.Other issues related global logistics, like logistic flow   and customer;6.Case study.7.The furture trend of R.O.C. global logistics managment.

description.zh: 中小企業策略和管理： 中小企業相對於大企業，在資源的取得乃居於弱勢，如何利用中小企業的優點以創造其競爭優勢，乃本課程研究的重點。 本課程之內容： 1.中小企業的定義 2.創業家 3.特許權 4.財務計劃 5.組織計劃和 TQM 6.行銷研究及通路 7.電腦應用 8.人際關係 9.採購和存貨 10.經營策略 11.國內外中小企業個案研討。
description.en: Small Business Strategy and Management: The aim of the course is to students understand how to create competitive advantage and management in small business. The content of the course description: 1.Definition of small business 2.Entrepreneur 3.Franchises 4.Financing 5.Organizational planning and TQM 6.Marketing Research and Marketing channels 7.Computers 8.Human Relations 9.Purchasing and Inventories 10.Stragetic management 11.Cast studies.

description.zh: 本課程除了基礎物流管理理論外，主要以物流管理之實務、案例討論為主要重點。
description.en: This course includes basic theory of logistic management. Besides, the case study will be focused.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討行銷在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的行銷理論來探討全球行銷的重要又關鍵議題，其中包括全球行銷與公司策略的關係與整合、整合行銷概念、新經濟時代的行銷觀念與全球營運模式、整合行銷的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global marketing as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Marketing Management builds on Global Marketing Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

description.zh: 電子商務的應用與發展已對企業經營與生活方式造成相當大的衝擊，在網路發展先驅與先行導入區域已逐漸將網路應用納入企業日常運作以及居家生活中的一部份。這些應用無論我們從媒體(media)功能、通路(channel)功能來區分，或是從對象來分為B2B、B2C、C2C以及企業內部之應用，其企業經營的方式與傳統模式有許多的不同，因而也衍生許多有趣、重要課題。
description.en: Introduction to Electronic Commerce (E-commerce)- information evolution- information network, telecommunication and business - information society (4C)‥ Discussion of business to business operations (Extranet)‥ Discussion of business to consumer services (Internet) and internet marketing Discussion of organization management and control (Intranet)Discussion of e-commerce systems and technology support

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course focuses on three major areas:1.The environment of global markets and cross-cultural comparison.2.Assessment of global market opportunities and threats.3.Development and implementation of global marketing strategies.

description.zh: 透過課堂上課方式以及鼓勵學生將實務上碰到的案例帶入課堂參與討論，使學生對策略行銷之理論與實務有更深入的瞭解，包括 1. 市場導向、顧客滿意及利潤、 2. 市場為基礎的管理、 3. 定義市場、潛在市場、市場需求、 4. 客戶分析與價值創造、 5. 市場區隔與區隔策略、 6. 競爭者分析與競爭地位、 7. 產品定位與產品策略、 8. 市場為基礎的定訂價與訂價策略、 9. 行銷通路與銷售系統、 10. 行銷溝通與顧客回應、 11. 攻擊性行銷策略 、12. 防禦性行銷策略、13. 全球行銷策略、14. 行銷計畫擬定、15. 策略執行與績效衡量、16. 市場為基礎的策略與利潤成長、17. 其他學生有興趣研究或學習的行銷策略主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding strategic marketing strategy. Topics are as follows: 1. Market Orientation, Customer Satisfaction, and Profitability, 2. Market-Based Management, 3. Market Definition, Potential, and Demand, 4. Customer Analysis and Value Creation, 5. Market Segmentation and Segmentation Strategies, 6. Competitor Analysis and Competitive Position, 7. Product Positioning and Product Strategies, 8. Market-Based Pricing and Pricing Strategies, 9. Marketing Channel and Sales Systems, 10. Marketing Communications and Customer Response, 11. Offensive Marketing Strategies, 12. Defensive Marketing Strategies, 13. Global Marketing Strategies, 14. Developing a Marketing Plan, 15. Strategy Implementation and Performance Metrics, 16. Market-Based Strategies and Profitable Growth, 17. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches and/or studies.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 機構與機械元件設計基礎，古典動力學基礎，近代機械加工，電機機械，電機驅動與設計，光電及感測基本原理，機電系統匹配，專題實作及實驗等機電相關課題
description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, special topics and labs of machatrocics system.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹流體機械設計上之相關理論與其流場行為的分析方法，內容包括流體機械的熱流動力學、翼列間流場理論、軸流式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機)設計與分析、離心式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機) 設計與分析、渦卷式和螺旋式壓縮機設計與分析、電腦輔助流體機械設計。
description.en: This course intends to introduction the design principles of turbomachinery and the methods to analyze the flow behavior. The course contents are: thermo-fluid dynamics aspects of turbomachinery, cascade flow, preliminary design and analysis of xial-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fan), centrifugal-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fans), scroll and screw compressor, the computational aided design of turbomechinery.

description.zh: 「電化冶金」乃是一門探討如何利用電化學原理從事冶金工作之研究，任何電化學反應之進行都必須有陽極、陰極、電解液（質）之存在方能發生，缺一不可，了解陽極之氧化反應，陰極之還原反應，陰陽極各界面之行為，與電解質之導電度行為，實為進入電化學領域之不二法門，再以電化學方面之知識基礎，應用在金屬之濕法冶鍊，金屬之防蝕等材料工程上，期能精鍊更高純度之金屬，保固金屬並延長使用壽命。本課程包括：介紹一連串電化學理論為基礎，從而由淺入深地應用到冶金及材料科學上以期使學生學習到實際的電化學應用、實務與理論配合。學生須先具備分析化學及物理化學的知識。由表面性質的決定，談到界面電化學，及界面電荷傳導，及分佈的電性質理論，來決定溶液中化學反應發生的模式.
description.en: Electrochemical metallurgy is a course to study how to utilize electrochemistry todo the research of metallurgy, any electrochemical reaction should be done at theexistence of anode, cathode and electrolyte, therefore, to understand the oxidation reaction of anode, the reduction reaction of cathode, their interface behaviors,and the conductivity behavior of electrolyte, are the only way to enter electrochemical`territory. Further, using the basic knowledge of electrochemistry to apply at the wet process smelting and anticorrosion of metal, in order to expect a higher degree ofpurity, protection and longetivity. From introduction to a series of fundamental electrochemical theory to applying metallurgy and material science step by step,the course let students learn practically applied electrochemistry,matching practice with theory.Students should be owning the knowledgeof analytical chemistry and physic chemistry.They shall determine the surface property, surface electrochemist

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content.

name.zh: 消費者行為與行銷策略

description.zh: 企業經營體制個案診斷，以診斷方式、技術、步驟及書面、口頭報告應如何撰寫。
description.en: This topic focus on the case study which based on diagnostic method, technique, skill, procedure, and reporting and presenting skill..

description.zh: 分子生物學主要藉由分子的方法來探討細胞的生成、組成、功能及相互間之作用。因此此課程會含概以下四大部分：1.	細胞之簡介2.	分子基因學3.	細胞之內部組成4.	細胞間之生長，交互作用之影響
description.en: Molecular Biology is chiefly concentrated with eucaryotic cells and its title reflects the prime importance of the insights that have come from the molecular approach. This course will cover the following four different parts.1.	Introduction to the cell2.	Molecular genetics3.	Internal organization of the cell4.	Cells in their social context

description.zh: 開課：機電、製科所合開（上學期）(含一般生、在職生)本課程說明RFID系統架構，技術、編碼、和應用標準，資訊系統，效益評估，隱私權問題，及各領域或產業的創新應用和案例。
description.en: This course is to explain the RFID system structure, the standard of technology, object coding and applications, IT solution systems, ROI considerations, privacy issues, and then the innovative applications in different field or industry.
